name: David Willersdorf - The Sound of Heaven
description: "The Sound of Heaven" CD contains twelve songs by Christian songwriter and musician, David Willersdorf; eleven of which were recorded live, plus a bonus studio track. You can also enjoy the live experience DVD by selecting it below. Track list: Big The Sound of Heaven You're All My Love All You Have Given The Returning Song Such a Day With My Life (Loaves and Fishes) Because of You To Wait On You Greater Let Your Presence Fall (Remix) High King of Heaven (Studio) Also available now as a download on iTunes! Visit David Willersdorf on iTunes

name: David Willersdorf - Glorious
description: Available now as a download on iTunes! Visit David Willersdorf on iTunes The Glorious EP was recorded live in the Blue Mountains of Sydney, Australia. It was engineered by the talented Bruce Wheatley. David Willersdorf was joined by guest musicians David Hopper (Bass and Vocals), Kate Plummer (Guitar), Ric Thomas (Drums) and Tracey Warrey (Vocals). Track List: Glorious Your Love I Will Obey To Wait On You Lift My Eyes

name: David Willersdorf - Freedom's Pages
description: Available now as a download on iTunes! Visit David Willersdorf on iTunes On Freedom’s Pages, David Willersdorf was joined by other great vocalists, including Steve Apirana, Lisa Reynolds, Eric Ossebaar, Steve Larmar, Diana Holt and Liana Todd. Produced by Craig Ross, Freedom’s Pages was David’s first full album and was recorded on the Sunshine Coast of Queensland, Australia. Track List: Where You Go – Eric Ossebaar Hallowed Be – David Willersdorf Always in You – Lisa Reynolds Lay Me Down – Diana Holt Shadow Over Me – Eric Ossebaar We Sing – Steve Apirana Grace and Mercy – Steve Larmar I Will Delight – Steve Larmar, Liana Todd and David Willersdorf Freedom’s Pages Interlude (Instrumental) Found It All – Steve Apirana Let Your Presence Fall – Lisa Reynolds and David Willersdorf Visions of Love – Steve Larmar
